facebook.title: Supporting and Educating Young Muslim Women: Stories from Australia and the UK (Hardback) - Routledge
facebook.summary:
This is a fantastic publication - very practical. Every school should have a copy.

Supporting and Educating Young Muslim Women: Stories from Australia and the UK. It is part of the Routledge series: Critical Studies in Gender and Sexuality in Education.

author.name: DeakinREDI
author.description: Research for Educational Impact (REDI) is the strategic research centre for education at Deakin University, Melbourne, Australia.
